node.title: It's mixed emotions for Queenslanders ahead of the border reopening tomorrow, here's what they think
node.alt: The silhouettes of two people inside an Airport terminal with Virgin planes outside the window.
node.description: Queensland will open its border in less than 24 hours to southern hotspots and it is a mixture of emotions for locals. Feelings of doubt and wariness sit beside the excitement of Christmas reunions, as the state readies for COVID-19 to hit like it has never done before.
node.content:
["Queensland's border will reopen in less than 24 hours and the state is a mixture of emotions.", "From 1am Monday, fully vaccinated people from hotspots in New South Wales, Victoria and South Australia may\u00a0enter the state without quarantining.", "Despite the new freedoms, the journey\u00a0through COVID-19 is far from over.", "Feelings of doubt and wariness tinge\u00a0the excitement of Christmas reunions, as the state readies for COVID-19 to hit like it has never done before.", "Here's what Queenslanders are thinking about what lays ahead:", "
'Happy in one way' \u2014 Deborah Diezmann
", "Deborah Diezmann's son, who lives in Sydney, will finally be able to visit her.\u00a0", "They'll be spending Christmas together at her Sunshine Coast home.", "", "
Deborah Diezmann will\u00a0finally get to see her son.(ABC News: Michael Lloyd)
", "\"We've only seen him once this year, so we're very, very excited to be able to see him and to be able to share Christmas with the family,\" she said.", "\"I'm feeling happy in one way \u2026\u00a0but\u00a0a little hesitant\u00a0\u2026 that we probably need to be a bit more careful", "\"We'll just do whatever has to be done to make it safe.", "\"I carry a mask. It's hard when not everyone's wearing them but, if they come back in, I'll definitely wear them.\"", "
'We have to be careful' \u2014 Lopeta Theilao
", "\"It's good to open but we have to be careful of the outcome,\" said Lopeta\u00a0Theilao, from the Brisbane suburb of Carseldine.", "\"We have to [be more aware of social distancing]\u00a0just to make sure everyone's OK\u00a0and not to get sick.", "", "
\u00a0Lopeta Theilau is enjoying life post lockdowns and looks forward to more freedoms.(ABC News: Michael Lloyd)
", "\"We have to wear masks if we need them, but now it's a little bit of freedom.", "\"It feels really good that you can go out and enjoy your time with your family and friends.\"", "
'Too early' \u2014 Paige Price
", "Brisbane local Paige Price questioned whether the border reopening was too soon, given the outbreak of the Omicron variant in New South Wales.", "\"I'm glad that families get to see each other again \u2026 but I think it's too early, considering [the emergence of] Omicron,\" Ms Price\u00a0said.", "", "
Paige Price (on right) with friend Madison Volzke hope people will follow the quarantine rules.
", "\"I don't think it's getting better. I think it's just going to get worse as soon as the borders reopen again and Queensland's going to be like New South Wales and Victoria were.", "\"I think a lot of people will, but not everyone will.\"", "
'As long as people stay true' \u2014 Madison Volzke
", "Madison\u00a0Volzke said she hoped\u00a0people were\u00a0\"doing the right thing\" as they crossed the border.", "\"It's good to see families going back home to each other, as long as people stay true to home quarantine,\" Ms Volzke\u00a0said.", "\"I'm excited to go out into the world again, to travel.", "\"[But]\u00a0I don't want to wear a mask again.\"", "
'Ripper!' \u2014\u00a0George Jakubans
", "George Jakubans'\u00a0daughter lives in Sydney\u00a0and he hasn't seen her since he moved to West End in Brisbane\u00a0from Christchurch earlier this year.", "\"She's coming up from Sydney to spend Christmas with me and her mother,\" Mr Jakubans\u00a0said.", "\"What a ripper!", "", "
George Jakubans is looking forward to being reunited with his daughter.(ABC News: Michael Lloyd)
", "\"She's wondering and hoping that she can get through [the border]\u00a0and I am too.", "\"I certainly wasn't going to go down there.", "\"I lived in New Zealand for the last 20 years.\u00a0I'm just back here now because I can't go back there.", "\"We're going to have a great Christmas.", "\"I want to be conscious of [COVID-19]. I want to be careful and think about it and keep my distances as much as I can, as if someone's got the flu or if someone's coughing.\"", "
'Not worried one iota' \u2014\u00a0Len Mondon
", "A jovial Len Mondon, who is\u00a0visiting Brisbane from Mackay, couldn't be less concerned about an influx of travellers from southern states.", "There's \"no way in hell\" that he would even wear a mask.", "", "
Len Monden congratulated Ms Palasczuk on how she handled the pandemic.(ABC News: Michael Lloyd)
", "\"It doesn't worry me one iota,\" he said.", "\"This is the best idea ever, [Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk]\u00a0has done a good job.\"", "
'Not really too bothered' \u2014 Andrew Brown
", "Andrew Brown said he hadn't really been affected by the pandemic and the borders reopening was not really concerning.", "\"I'm not really too bothered to be honest,\" the Redland Bay resident said.", "", "
Len Monden is looking forward to seeing his father, who lives in Victoria.(ABC News: Michael Lloyd)
", "\"It hasn't really affected me.\"", "\"I'm looking forward to being able to go on holidays and that sort of stuff.", "\"My old man lives in Victoria so he's looking forward to coming up.", "\"It'll be good.\"", "
'There might be cases coming' \u2014 Ruby Lee
", "To Ruby Lee, the border opening has pros and cons, especially for the Gold Coast, where she lives.", "\"It is what it is,\" she said.", "", "
Ruby Lee hopes the border reopening will encourage people to get vaccinated.(ABC News: Michael Llloyd)
", "\"It's a really good thing because we get to travel and stuff, but there might be cases coming.", "\"I don't think I'll be wearing a mask because I am double jabbed, but I'm definitely going to be more cautious.", "\"Hopefully, people will get vaccinated.\"", "
'I don't care, I'm double-vaxxed' \u2014 Kirt Andrews
", "Kirt Andrews said he had no plans to travel any time soon, but\u00a0was happy for the families who would be reunited after tomorrow.", "\"It's good allowing [families]\u00a0to come back together around this time on Christmas,\" the Brisbane resident said.", "", "
Kirt Andrews is double vaccinated and isn't too worried about the borders reopening.(ABC News: Michael Lloyd)
", "\"I'll probably just chill up here for Christmas and spend it with my girlfriend or family.", "\"At the moment, I don't really care if [the border]\u00a0opens because it doesn't affect me at all.", "\"I'm double-vaxxed.\""]
